metadata.title: CVE-2020-17508 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The ATS ESI plugin has a memory disclosure vulnerability. If you arerunning the plugin please upgrade. Apache Traffic Server versions 7.0.0 to7.1.11 and 8.0.0 to 8.1.0 are affected.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
